These are the steps we took to analyze our data.  



----
## **Load the libraries**

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(naniar)
library(skimr)
```

<br>
<br>

## **Cleaning Up the Data**

### Load the data frame


```{r}
covid <- readr::read_csv("data/WHO-COVID-19-global-data.csv")
```


### Clean the names
```{r}
covid<-janitor::clean_names(covid)
```

<br>
<br>

## **Preliminary analysis**
```{r}
skim(covid)
```

<font size="3" color="blue">The NA's in this data are represented by "NA"</font>
